reviews.text: I stumbled on this place walking in Barcelona in June and immediately was taking away by the art exhibition especially by one painting by Bruno Pedrosa. The owner - Caterina was very helpful and responsive. I ended up buying this piece later when I was back to US. Caterina was very helpful and the whole experience was such a pleasure! I love Barcelona and now have a piece of it in my home. Thank you, Caterina and please say my regards to your father, Bruno Pedrosa.

Went there the second day after apparently it opened and was blown away.
To find such a little gem selling beautiful pieces of art is rare, the selection was eclectic and they have pieces from artist of several countries.
Was hard leaving the shop resisting the urge of buying every single item. 
If you happen to be in Barcelona is definitely worth the visit.

The two owners are gentle and art connoisseur. They choose an international artist team. All of them with more than 35 years of career. I think is a very interesting place to visit for the art lovers.
